title: School Address

content: You can contact us at (868) 665-1234 or email us at info@shivaboys.edu.tt.

title: Environmental Club
content: The Envi Club at Shiva Boys promotes awareness about climate change and sustainability.

title: Input Device Definition
content: An input device in computing is a hardware component used to provide data and control signals to a computer. Examples include keyboards, mice, and scanners.
